text: Hata mkulu wa wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga yokemigwa Mikaeli, kipigiti viyakalile yoibamilila na Mwenembago wogombela lukuli lwa Musa, hagezile kumdukumiza na kumulonga vihile, ila kalonga “Mndewa yakukomhokele.”1:9 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha DANIELI 10:13, 21; 12:1; LUGUBULO 12:7; NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 34:6; ZAKALIA 3:2.
